content: this square pattern is the first part of the ** rustling leaves blanket free crochet along 1 ** > ** you can find the pdf for the full rustling leaves blanket here 2 ** you can use this pattern to make just the leaf granny square and use it for any project you d like or follow the instructions for the rustling leaves blanket you can also find the video tutorial here https //youtu be/pszrcmxt2co - the pattern is written in us terminology - skill level - intermediate - materials * 5 0 mm / h crochet hook * worsted weight yarn i used ** lion brand color theory yarn in bee pollen 3 ** - you will need about 30g/68m/74yd - finished size - 8x8 in 20 3x20 3 cm square if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie com/crochet/autumn-crochet-blanket/ 2 https //madebygootie krtra com/t/rgvjjlakkga4 3 https //lionbrand sjv io/xm9dl4
